label: paymentCurrencyCode
comment: The code specifying the currency for this payment trade settlement.
The code specifying the payment currency for this header trade settlement.

rangeIncludes.comment: A character string used to represent a currency.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
